snippet: Adm. Michelle Janine Howard on Tuesday became the first woman to be promoted to four-star admiral, the Navy’s highest rank.
lead_paragraph: Adm. Michelle Janine Howard on Tuesday became the first woman to be promoted to four-star admiral, the Navy’s highest rank.

headline.main: In a First for the Navy, a Woman Becomes a Four-Star Admiral
headline.print_headline: In A First For the Navy, a Woman Becomes a Four-Star Admiral
